item.title: Geekwise Academy: JavaScript II with AngularJS
item.description:
Learn intermediate to advanced JavaScript skills using Googleâ€™s AngularJS framework for developing rich internet applications. This class also introduces students to creating an API with JSON, Node.js and MongoDB.

Visit the course overview page to learn more and get started learning!
